        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Wind of Chaos 7If successfully cast, pick a visible unit within 18". Roll a number of dice equal to the total casting roll that was rolled for this spell (for example, if Wind of Chaos was cast with a casting roll of 8, roll 8 dice). For each roll of 5, the target unit suffers one mortal wound. For each roll of 6, the target unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

      • Darkoath Warqueen [80pts]

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, HERO, DARKOATH WARQUEEN, Leader

        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        The Will of the Gods If this model is your general and uses this command ability, then you can re--roll failed charge rolls for friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS units that are wholly within 12" of it at the start of the charge phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Darkoath Warqueen 6"585+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Infernal Runeshield Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to this model. On a 6+ the wound is negated and the attacking model's unit suffers 1 mortal wound after all of their attacks have been made.
        Savage Duellist Attacks made with this model's Warlord Axe have a Damage characteristic of 2 if they target an enemy HERO or MONSTER. In addition, each time a wound inflicted by this model slays a HERO or MONSTER, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model's Warlord Axe for the remainder of the battle.

        Exalted Charioteer The leader of this unit is the Exalted Charioteer. His attacks with a Chaos Greatblade or Chaos War-flail hit on 3+ rather than 4+.
        Explosive Brutality If this unit makes a charge move, and the result of the charge roll was 8 or more, all Gorebeasts in the unit make 6 attacks with their Brutish Fists rather than 3 until the end of the turn.
        Gorebeast Charge After this unit has finished a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy model within 2"; for each roll of 6 that model's unit suffers a mortal wound.

    • Battalion [500pts]

      • Battalion: Godsworn Champions of Ruin [170pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Unholy Challenge


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Unholy Challenge In each of your hero phases, one unit from the Godsworn Champions of Ruin that is within 3" of an enemy HERO or MONSTER can issue an unholy challenge, calling upon the Dark Gods to give them the power to smith down the foe. This call is answered, allowing your unit to immediately pile in and then attack as if it were the combat phase.

      • Battalion: Godswrath Warband [150pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: *Godswrath Warband, Chaos Doom Bolts


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        *Godswrath Warband
        Chaos Doom Bolts In each of your hero phsaes, choose one Chaos Warshrine from the Godswrath Warband. Roll 1 dicefor each unit from the warband that is within 24" of that Chaos Warshrine (do ot count the Warshrine itself). For each result of 6 you can pick an enemy unit that is visible to the Warshrine. The Chaos Gods have heeded the prayers of their followers, and unleashed a Chaos Doom Bolt that smites the enemy unit, which suffers D3 mortal wounds. An enemy unit cannot be struck by more than one Chaos Doom Bolt in the same turn - if you run out of any enemy units to smite, you must start picking friendly units (whether visible to the Warshrine or not) until all of the Chaos Doom Bolts have found a target! The Dark Gods are fickle...

      • Battalion: Ruinbringer Warband [180pts]

        Categories: Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Devastating Charge


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Devastating Charge Once per battle, in any of your hero phases, a Ruinbringer Warband can [...] charge [...]. When it does so, all of the units in the battalion immediately attempt to make a charge move as if it were a charge phase. After any charges have been made, any enemy units within 3" of any models from the battalion [...] and suffer D3 mortal wounds. Enemy units within 3" of more than 10 models from the battalion suffer D6 mortal wounds instead.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Selections: Slaves to Darkness

        Categories: Allegiance

        Aura of Chaos Power: Khorne, No Mark, Nurgle, Slaanesh, Tzeentch, Battalion Abilities: Aura of Chaos Power, Eye of the Gods, Eye of the Gods - 2D6 roll: 02 - Spawndom, 03-04 - Unholy Resilience, 05 - Iron Skin, 06-08 - The Eye Opens, 09 - Murderous Mutation, 10-11 - Slaughterer's Strength, 12 - Dark Apotheosis


        Aura of Chaos Power Ability Ref
        Khorne Re-roll hot rolls of 1 for attacks made in the combat phase by a unit granted this ability.
        No Mark Add 1 to the Bravery of a unit granted this ability.
        Nurgle Re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made by a unit granted this ability.
        Slaanesh Re-roll dice rolls of 1 when making run or charge moves for a unit granted this ability.
        Tzeentch Re-roll save rolls of 1 for a unit granted this ability.
        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Aura of Chaos Power SLAVES TO DARKNESS HEROES can grant an ability to friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS units which have the same Mark of Chaos as them. The units in receipt of the power must be within 6" of the HERO when they use the ability, and cannot be a HERO themselves. Look up the HERO's Mark of Chaos on the Aura of Power table to see what benefit the units are granted. A unit that is within 6" of more than one friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS HERO can only use the Aura of Chaos Power from one of them.
        Eye of the Gods If a CHAOS HERO in a SLAVES TO DARKNESS army (with the exception of any DAEMON PRINCES) makes an attack in a combat phase that salys one or more enemy HEROES or MONSTERS, make a roll on the Eye of the Gods table after the HERO's attacks have been completed. Roll a dice if a reward other than "The Eye Opens" is received by a model more than once. On a 1-3 apply the "Spawndom" result instead, and on a 4-6 apply the "Dark Apotheosis" result instead.
        Eye of the Gods - 2D6 roll Reward Ref
        02 - Spawndom You can add a Chaos Spawn to your army. If you do, set up a Chaos Spawn model within 1" of the HERO, and then remove the hero. The Chaos Spawn does not cost reinforcement points in a Pitched Batle. It cannot attack in the phase in which it is set up. If you do not add a Chaos Spawn to your army, the hero suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        03-04 - Unholy Resilience Add 1 to the HERO's Wounds characteristic for the resst of the battle.
        05 - Iron Skin Add 1 to the HERO's save rolls for the rest of the battle.
        06-08 - The Eye Opens You can re-roll the next failed hit, wound or save roll for the HERO.
        09 - Murderous Mutation Add 1 to the HERO's hit rolls for the rest of the battle.
        10-11 - Slaughterer's Strength Add 1 to the HERO's wound rolls for the rest of the battle.
        12 - Dark Apotheosis You can add a Daemon Prince to your army. If you do, set up a Daemon Prince model within 1" of the HERO, and then remove the hero. The Daemon Prince does not cost reinforcement points in a Pitched Battle. It cannot attack in the phase in which it is set up. if you do not add a Daemon Prince to your army, treat this as "The Eye Opens" instead.

    • Malign Sorcery [80pts]

      • Endless Spell: Malevolent Maelstrom [10pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, MALEVOLENT MAELSTROM, SHYISH, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Malevolent Maelstrom, Unit Abilities: Devourerer of Sorcery and Souls, Empowered by Shyish, Fly, Morbid Detonation, Predatory


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Malevolent Maelstrom 7If successfully cast, set up a Malevolent Maelstrom model wholly within 18" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Devourerer of Sorcery and Souls If a WIZARD successfully casts a spell within 12" of a Malevolent Maelstrom, and that spell is not unbound, the Malevolent Maelstrom will attempt to steal the energies of the spell. Make an additional unbinding roll for that spell. If this unbinding roll is successful, the spell is unbound and 1 energy point is allocated to this model. In addition, 1 energy point is allocated to this model for each unit destroyed within 6" of this model.
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, allocate 1 additional energy point to this model at the start of each battle round.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Morbid Detonation At the end of each battle round, roll a dice for each Malevolent Maelstrom and add the number of energy points allocated to that model to the roll. On a 7+ that Malevolent Maelstrom explodes. Each unit within 3D6" of the model that exploded suffers D3 mortal wounds. The model that exploded is then dispelled.
        Predatory A Malevolent Maelstrom is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 8" and can fly.

      • Endless Spell: Purple Sun of Shyish [50pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, PURPLE SUN OF SHYISH, SHYISH, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Purple Sun of Shyish, Unit Abilities: Empowered by Shyish, End Given Form, Fly, Predatory, Swirling Death, Visage of Xereus


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Purple Sun of Shyish 8If successfully cast, set up a Purple Sun of Shyish model wholly within 6" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, this model can move 12" instead of 9".
        End Given Form After this model has moved, each unit that has any models it passed across, and each other unit that is within 1" of it at the end of its move, is subjected to the Purple Sun’s baleful energies. For each unit subjected to the baleful energies, roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in that unit. For each 6+ one model in that unit is slain. If the unit has Wounds characteristic of 6 or more, it suffers 2D6 mortal wounds instead.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory The Purple Sun of Shyish is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 9" and can fly.
        Swirling Death When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.
        Visage of Xereus Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of all units while they are within 6" of this model.

      • Endless Spell: Suffocating﻿﻿ Gravetide﻿ [20pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, SHYISH, SUFFOCATING GRAVETIDE, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Suffocating﻿﻿ Gravetide﻿, Unit Abilities: Empowered by Shyish, Fly, Necrotic Tide, Predatory, Pulled to the Grave, Rolling Barricade


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Suffocating﻿﻿ Gravetide﻿ 6If successfully cast, set up a Suffocating Gravetide model wholly within 4" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, this model can move up to 12" instead of 8".
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Necrotic Tide When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.
        Predatory A Suffocating Gravetide is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 8" and can fly.
        Pulled to the Grave After this model has moved, each unit that has any models it passed across suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of each unit that has any models it passed across until the end of the battle round.
        Rolling Barricade When a missile weapon targets a unit that has all of its models within 1" of this model, the target unit receives the benefit of cover if the attacking unit is closer to this model than it is to the target unit.

    • Realm of Battle

      • Realm of Battle

        Selections: Battle: Ghyran

        Categories: Realm of Battle

        Spell: Briarstorm, Flesh to Stone, Mirrorpool, Realmblood, Sicklewind, Whipvines


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Briarstorm 6If successfully cast, pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of the caster. Until your next hero phase, any unit that finishes a move within 3" of that point suffers D3 mortal wounds. Malign Sorcery p72
        Flesh to Stone 7If successfully cast, re-roll successful wound rolls for attacks that target the caster until your next hero phase. Malign Sorcery p72
        Mirrorpool 6If successfully cast, remove the caster from the battlefield and set them up again anywhere within 18" of their previous position, more than 9" from any enemy models. It may not move in the subsequent movement phase. Malign Sorcery; Official Errata, December 2018 p72; 1
        Realmblood 7If successfully cast, heal D3 wounds allocated to the caster. Malign Sorcery p72
        Sicklewind 7If successfully cast, pick a point on the battlefield within 12" of the caster that is visible to them and draw an imaginary straight line 1mm wide between that point and the closest part of the caster. Each unit other than the caster that has models passed across by this line suffers D3 mortal wounds. Malign Sorcery p72
        Whipvines 5If successfully cast, pick a point on the battlefield within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3" of this point. On a 4+ the unit being rolled for suffers 1 mortal wound. Malign Sorcery p72
